wikipedia_page.main: Frank Edward Pegg (2 August 1902 – August 1991) was an English professional footballer who scored 61 goals from 166 appearances in the Football League playing for Sunderland, Lincoln City, Bradford City, Norwich City and New Brighton. He played as an outside left.

response: *Frank Pegg (1902–1991): professional footballer born in Beeston.
